column4: Is there a system-wide equalizer? (not sure what pulse jack alsa oss are but I believe I'm using alsa apps with pulse)
not installed by default.  There are guides around, although I haven't had any success with them (relies on a pulseaudio module to load audio plugins, which I haven't been able to make work)
but it's possible in theory, and people have reported success
Thanks.  I've not dug deep (if at all) knowing that others have succeeded is motivation enough
